title: aria-checked attribute
description: Indicates the current "checked" state of checkboxes, radio buttons, and other widgets. See related aria-pressed and aria-selected.

assertions.title: convey the "false" value
assertions.rationale: The user needs to be able to tell that the element is not checked
examples: The "false" value might be conveyed as "not checked", "unchecked", or something similar.

assertions.title: convey the "true" value
assertions.rationale: The user needs to be able to tell that the element is checked
examples: The "true" value might be conveyed as "checked" or something similar.

assertions.title: convey the "mixed" value
assertions.rationale: The user needs to be able to tell that the element is mixed
The user needs to know what the new value is and that the change was successful
examples: The new value is announced after it is changed.
